description: A pipeline configuration that extracts clinical narratives from Epic Clarity into OHDSI CDM.

config._desc: An example configuration to extract notes from mssql, replace values as appropriate
config.query: SELECT hsp.pat_id, note_meta.pat_enc_csn_idï¼Œ text.note_id, text.line, coalesce(note_meta.create_instant_dttm, text.contact_date) start_date, text.note_text FROM clarity.hno_note_text text JOIN clarity.hno_info note_meta ON text.note_id = note_meta.note_id JOIN clarity.pat_enc_hsp hsp ON text.pat_enc_csn_id = hsp.pat_enc_csn_id;

config._desc: replaces note_text field in-place (from output of previous step query)
An example configuration to load notes into OHDSI CDM, replace values as appropriate
config.query: INSERT INTO CDM_SCHEMA.NOTE (note_id, person_id, visit_occurrence_id, note_datetime, note_type_concept_id, note_class_concept_id, note_text, encoding_concept_id, language_concept_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, 44814645, 40798302, ?, 32678, 4180186);
